hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: major minor version TODO: get this from a file

scm.projectOptions: noallwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo ++++++++++++++ Update wireshark_version ++++++++++++++++++++++
cd ..
p4 edit //Wireshark_Spirent/mainline/src/version_info.c //Wireshark_Spirent/mainline/src/config.nmake //Wireshark_Spirent/mainline/src/debian/changelog //Wireshark_Spirent/mainline/src/packaging/rpm/SPECS/wireshark.spec.in
sudo chmod -R 777 .

hudson.plugins.python.Python.command:
#!/usr/bin/python
import os import sys
# print os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
def UpdateVersion_info(filename, newver): # read and write version_info.c # first find version number, then increase by one # then write and close file fread = None fwrite = None if "version_info.c" in filename: fread = open('./wireshark_version/version_info.c', 'r') fwrite = open('./wireshark_version/version_info_new.c', 'w') elif "config.nmake" in filename: fread = open ('./wireshark_version/config.nmake', 'r') fwrite = open ('./wireshark_version/config_new.nmake', 'w') elif "changelog" in filename: fread = open ('./wireshark_version/debian/changelog', 'r') fwrite = open ('./wireshark_version/debian/changelog_new', 'w') elif "wireshark.spec.in" in filename: fread = open ('./wireshark_version/packaging/rpm/SPECS/wireshark.spec.in', 'r') fwrite = open ('./wireshark_version/packaging/rpm/SPECS/wireshark_new.spec.in', 'w')
for line in fread: # version_info.c: full string is "Spirent Wireshark 1.10.3 v3.\n" if "Spirent Wireshark 1.10.3 v" in line: # Get current version junk1, junk2, junk3, vstr = line.split(' ', 4) vstr2, junk4 = vstr.split('.', 2) vstr3 = vstr2[1:]
# Get new version and set up the new string newver = int(vstr3) + 1 newline = junk1 + ' ' + junk2 + ' ' + junk3 + ' ' + 'v' + str(newver) + '.' + junk4 + '\n' fwrite.write(newline)
# config.nmake: VERSION_EXTRA=-Spirent-3 elif "VERSION_EXTRA=-Spirent-" in line: junk1, junk2, vstr = line.split('-', 3) vstr = str(newver) newline = junk1 + '-' + junk2 + '-' + vstr + '\n' fwrite.write(newline)
# debian/changelog: wireshark (1.10.3-spirent-3) unstable; urgency=low elif "urgency=low" in line: junk1, junk2, vstr = line.split('-', 3) vstr2, junk3 = vstr.split(')', 2) vstr2 = str(newver) newline = junk1 + '-' + junk2 + '-' + vstr2 + ')' + junk3 + '\n' print "newline ", newline
fwrite.write(newline)
elif "Release: spirent_" in line: junk1, vstr = line.split('_', 2) vstr = str(newver) newline = junk1 + '_' + vstr + '\n' fwrite.write(newline)
else: fwrite.write(line)
fread.close() fwrite.close()
if "version_info.c" in filename: os.remove('./wireshark_version/version_info.c') os.rename('./wireshark_version/version_info_new.c', './wireshark_version/version_info.c') elif "config.nmake" in filename: os.remove('./wireshark_version/config.nmake') os.rename('./wireshark_version/config_new.nmake', './wireshark_version/config.nmake') elif "changelog" in filename: os.remove('./wireshark_version/debian/changelog') os.rename('./wireshark_version/debian/changelog_new', './wireshark_version/debian/changelog') elif "wireshark.spec.in" in filename: os.remove('./wireshark_version/packaging/rpm/SPECS/wireshark.spec.in') os.rename('./wireshark_version/packaging/rpm/SPECS/wireshark_new.spec.in', './wireshark_version/packaging/rpm/SPECS/wireshark.spec.in')
return newver
# mian() def main(): newver = 0
filename = "./wireshark_version/version_info.c" newver = UpdateVersion_info(filename, newver)
filename = "./wireshark_version/config.nmake" UpdateVersion_info(filename, newver)
filename = "./wireshark_version/debian/changelog" UpdateVersion_info(filename, newver)
filename = "./wireshark_version/packaging/rpm/SPECS/wireshark.spec.in" UpdateVersion_info(filename, newver)
# call main() if __name__ == '__main__': main()

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command: p4 submit -d "Update wireshark version number for change $P4_CHANGELIST"
